subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: J. J. McDermott ran and threw for first-quarter touchdowns and Southern Methodist (8-5) beat Pittsburgh (6-7) by 28-6 in the BBVA Compass Bowl in Birmingham, Ala.
snippet: J. J. McDermott ran and threw for first-quarter touchdowns and Southern Methodist (8-5) beat Pittsburgh (6-7) by 28-6 in the BBVA Compass Bowl in Birmingham, Ala.
